content: Iam a Mathematician working as a data scientist in NLP and OR areas. I have experience building Research teams and products based on Machine learning . Experienced with theoritical computer science , PAC learning ,SVMs and Statistics. Also a jazz guitarist who plays 8 finger legato style . Quantum Computing and Algebraic Geometry are my latest Fads.
